articles.title: Climate change: Europe and polar regions bear brunt of warming in 2022 - BBC
articles.description: Last year was the world's fifth warmest year with Europe enduring its hottest summer on record
articles.content:
The polar regions and Europe were hit hardest by global warming in 2022, according to a new analysis.
